page.title: 17The Fun Run
page.content: In April 1984 we held a sponsored fun run along the newly built Great Chart by-pass.We did it for two reasons,to raise money to go towards books and sports equipment and to celebrate the opening of the by-pass.The main road outside was so busy that we definitely benefitted from it.The day dawned dreary and black clouds covered the sky.As we arrived there in people's cars the skies opened and it began bucketing down.We grouped into threes with an adult.Various groups started off in the pouring rain.There were 5 refreshment stations with drinks of orange.Everyone completed the three miles.When we all returned to school Doris,our cook,gave us a drink of cocoa and we sat clutching our sponsor form with a school stamp on it.
